verses.kjv: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.
verses.ct: God is recognized throughout Judah; his name is honored in Israel.

verses.kjv: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
verses.ct: His tent of worship stands in Salem, and his dwelling place is in Zion.

verses.kjv: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.
verses.ct: Right there he shattered the flaming arrows, the shield, the sword, and every weapon of war. Selah.

verses.kjv: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.
verses.ct: You are more radiant and majestic than the mountains full of plunder.

verses.kjv: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.
verses.ct: The boldest warriors have been stripped of everything; they drifted into the sleep of death, and not one of those mighty soldiers could even lift a hand.

verses.kjv: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.
verses.ct: When you spoke your rebuke, God of Jacob, both horse and chariot fell into a deathlike stillness.

verses.kjv: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
verses.ct: You — you alone — are to be deeply revered. Who can stand in your presence once your anger is stirred?

verses.kjv: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
verses.ct: You announced your verdict from heaven; the earth trembled and fell silent

verses.kjv: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.
verses.ct: when God rose up to execute justice, to rescue all the oppressed of the earth. Selah.

verses.kjv: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
verses.ct: Even human rage will end up bringing you praise, and whatever fury remains, you will hold in check.

verses.kjv: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.
verses.ct: Make your promises to the LORD your God and follow through on them. Let everyone around him bring gifts to the one who deserves deep reverence.

verses.kjv: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
verses.ct: He cuts down the arrogance of rulers; the kings of the earth are terrified of him.
